tagDescription: Correspondence - bound Correspondence between Winfield Sifton and Sir Robert Peks dealing with the charter difficulties of the Canal Company and the consequent financial re - organization both through Canadian and British holding companies. 2 files.
enclosure of the amendments to the charter of The Beauharnois Light, Heat and Power Company.
Letter Concerning the export of hydro - power to the United States.
enclosure of documents Concerning The Beauharnois Light, Heat and Power Company.
Enclosure Concerning The Beauharnois Light, Heat and Power Company and the proposal to build the St. Lawrence waterway.
Correspondence with Winfield Sifton Concerning the hydro - power resources available for development in the upper St. Lawrence.
Correspondence with Winfield Sifton Concerning the St. Lawrence waterway

Correspondence - bound Correspondence between Winfield Sifton and W. S. Fiton who was the solicitor engaged pursuant to the agreement between The New Dominion Syndicate Limited and The Metropolitan Securities Corporation.
